doc.title: Caught in the Act
doc.plot: A gay married man is out on a lark, and meeting one of his former lady friends, invites her into a restaurant, where they order the delicacies of the season. Just as they are about to indulge, his wife, who passes the restaurant, looks into the window accidentally, where she sees the pair. She enters and breaks up this pleasant little dinner party much to the discomfiture of her husband and his lady friend.
